channel.title: I need help with my 317 Client
channel.description: [b][size=18pt]Alright, i need help with this one small thing! How do i change the Background of the Client.... Make a small tutorial on this post please, im not a client person at all.... and i really need to change it[/size][/b]

item.title: I need help with my 317 Client
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Bryan Owner_Bryan
item.description:
@Owner_Bryan wrote:

owndlol:

Its not in a .java. Just search through the folders for the background picture

Thank you, thats what i had wrong i feel stupid now, But atleast i have my background thanks to you

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with my 317 Client
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

There are tons of TUTs, but more than likely there is a picture called “background.png” or .gif. Just make your own background, make the file extension (.jpg, .gif, .png or w/e the background is) the same as the original background;s ext and it should change.

Read full topic
